Table of Contents

Struct SRGBColour

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Colour
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A wrapper struct around Color4 that takes care of converting between sRGB and linear colour spaces. Internally this struct stores the colour in sRGB space, which is exposed by the SRGB member. This struct converts to linear space by using the Linear member.

public struct SRGBColour : IEquatable<SRGBColour>
Implements
IEquatable<SRGBColour>
